table.name: address
table.remarks: Describes a postal or physical address. Tags: FLOSS SOLA Extension, Change History

column.name: description
column.remarks: The postal or physical address or if no formal addressing is used, a description or place name for the location.

column.name: ext_address_id
column.remarks: Optional identifier for the address that may reference further address details from an external system (e.g. address validation database).

column.name: rowidentifier
column.remarks: Identifies the all change records for the row in the address_historic table

column.name: rowversion
column.remarks: Sequential value indicating the number of times this row has been modified.

column.name: change_action
column.remarks: Indicates if the last data modification action that occurred to the row was insert (i), update (u) or delete (d).

column.name: change_user
column.remarks: The user id of the last person to modify the row.

column.name: change_time
column.remarks: The date and time the row was last modified.
